sentences.en: But it is not hindsight alone that finds a natural, not solely a supernatural, sequentiality here.
sentences.cn: 但是在这里发现一种自然的(不单单是超自然的)顺序性, 并非仅仅事后聪明.

sentences.en: But to Ione despair gave supernatural strength; she again tore herself from him.
sentences.cn: 可是绝望却使伊俄涅产生了无穷的力量, 她又一次挣脱了他.

sentences.en: Confucius did not accept the religious ideas of his times , and was sceptical of the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 孔子既不相信当时的宗教观, 也不相信超自然的神力.

sentences.en: Do you believe in the supernatural?
Ghosts and evil spirits are supernatural.
sentences.cn: 幽灵和恶鬼都是超自然的.

sentences.en: He had an aversion to anything that savored of the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌任何带有超自然意味的东西.

sentences.en: He writes short stories with a touch of the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 他写的短篇小说带有灵异色彩。

sentences.en: I don't believe in the supernatural.
She knew they would be powerless against the supernatural lucidity of her br ain.
sentences.cn: 她心里已料到这个剂量对今晚格外清醒的思维来说必将无济于事.

sentences.en: Some supernatural power told me that she would be at home this time.
sentences.cn: 冥冥之中有一种力量告诉我,这次她会在家了.

sentences.en: That yellow splendor was in itself something supernatural and heavenly to many of the peasant women.
sentences.cn: 这种金黄色的光辉,对许多农家妇女来说,其本身就具有某种超自然的神圣的气氛.

sentences.en: That yellow splendour was in itself somthing supernatural and heavenly to many of the peasant women.
sentences.cn: 这种金黄色的光辉,对许多农家妇女来说,其本身就具有某种超自然的天上的气氛.

sentences.en: This is a most remarkable and supernatural sort of house!
sentences.cn: 这是一所最希奇和最不可思议的房子!

sentences.en: UFOs are often explained as supernatural.
sentences.cn: 不明飞行物常常被解释为超自然现象.

words.tran_cn: 高的；神的；天上的；超自然的
超自然主义；超自然力；用已知的自然规律所无法解释的
超自然论者；超自然主义者
超自然现象；不可思议的事

trans.tran_en: events, powers, and creatures that cannot be explained, and seem to involve gods or magic

trans.tran_cn: 超自然的，神的，与神有关的，神奇的，运用神力的
trans.tran_en: impossible to explain by natural causes, and therefore seeming to involve the powers of gods or magic

trans.tran_cn: 超自然现象；不可思议的事
trans.tran_en: The supernatural is things that are supernatural
